description: Pope Francis will have at least five meetings with indigenous people during a trip to Canada in July, making good on a promise to apologise in the country for the Roman Catholic Church's role in abusive residential schools.

description: Germany is in talks with Canada over options for a liquefied natural gas (LNG) terminal on Canada's east coast for export to Europe, a German government official told Reuters on Tuesday.
